Highlighted Clause: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
Plain Language Summary: In case of financial changes like bankruptcy, your personal information may be disclosed or transferred to another entity as part of that process.

Highlighted Clause: We may modify, suspend, or terminate your access to or use of our Services anytime for any reason, such as if you violate the letter or spirit of our Terms or create harm, risk, or possible legal exposure for us, our users, or others.
Plain Language Summary: The company has the right to change, pause, or stop your access to their services at any point, particularly if you break their rules, put them or others at risk, or cause potential legal troubles.
